column2:
Effect sizes were labelled following
Cohen's (1988) recommendations.

The Two Sample t-test testing the
difference between Mg2 and control
(mean of x = 10.52, mean of y =
15.68) suggests that the effect is
negative, statistically significant,
and large (difference = -5.16, 95% CI
[-6.49, -3.83], t(18) = -8.15, p <
.001; Cohen's d = -3.65, 95% CI
[-5.10, -2.16])
